Playlist.Name: Nintendo Demo Vision
Playlist.Notes: The Demo Vision is an oldskool GameBoy development kit consisting of a large unit in a steel case, and 1 or 2 GameBoy units that connect to it via cables. The GameBoys are wired to draw power from the main unit, and to send their audio and video data to the main unit. Games are inserted directly into the GameBoys, and the image and sound are displayed simultaneously on the GB screen & speaker and Demo Vision's A/V outputs.
